fields.value: Ahem. Let's start with Fantasy. On the other hand: right now I am writing a reading journal on Kant's Critique of Pure Reason (in German). You can find it here: https://paper.wf/atheinschi/

fields.name: Other
fields.value: I play guitar with great passion, little talent and less skill. I love my dog, a little poodle lady
